turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and where did you want to pick this up? which Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On Imperial Highway in La Habra.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, will that be all for the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's it. Yes. Yeah, go ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 grande cappuccino with soy milk from starbucks on imperial highway.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that information right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the total comes out to $4.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool. i've placed your order. it should be ready for pick up in 10 mins.
